title: Synthesis, DFT studies on a series of tunable quinoline derivatives
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21089-21101
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03961K, Paper

Nagesh Dhanaji Chavan, Vijayaparthasarathi Vijayakumar
The synthesis, Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations, and photo physical characteristics of a range of quinoline derivatives have been described in the present work.
